title: Annual Hackathon
description: A 24-hour coding competition open to all students, showcasing innovation and teamwork.

title: Cultural Festival
description: A vibrant festival with music, dance, and art performances by students.

title: Sports Meet
description: Inter-university sports competitions including track, field, and team events.

title: Orientation Day
description: A welcome session for new students with campus tours and introduction activities.

title: Science Exhibition
description: An exhibition of innovative science projects created by students.

title: Football Final
description: The grand finale of the inter-university football championship.

title: Convocation Ceremony
description: The graduation ceremony to celebrate the achievements of final-year students.

title: Guest Lecture: AI Trends
description: A lecture by industry experts discussing the future of Artificial Intelligence.
